BadgeDetail.Name: Adaptable
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated that they are able to adapt to change. They can take on new challenges at short notice and deal with changing priorities effectively. They can improvise when necessary and bounce back from setbacks.

Task.Title: Darwin
Task.Body: Upload a description of how you have adapted to changing circumstances.
